<wiki:toc max_depth = "4">

Provides static string values which are used for logging events invoked in the Tagging namespace.

= Properties Summary =

|| *Property* || *Description* ||
|| [#TAG___CREATED TAG_CREATED] || The string value for tag creation event log ||
|| [#TAG___RENAMED TAG_RENAMED] || The string value for tag rename event log ||

= Properties Details =

== TAG_CREATED ==

`internal static string` TAG_CREATED
        The string value for tag creation event log given by "Tag \'{0}\' created." where {0} will be replaced by a tag name property when used.

----

== TAG_RENAMED ==

`internal static string` TAG_RENAMED
        The string value for tag creation event log given by "Tag \'{0}\' renamed to \'{1}\'." where {0} will be replaced by a tag name property when used.

----
